entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
